data.title: Aula 05 - Ing - 28 - 05
data.meta_description:
AULA 05_ING_28_05 - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides information on numerals in English including:

1) Cardinal numbers refer to quantity while ordinal numbers refer to order or position. Examples of cardinal and ordinal numbers from 1 to 100 are given. 

2) Examples are provided for how to write and say fractions and percentages in English. Fractions are said using cardinal numbers for the numerator and ordinal numbers for the denominator. Percentages are written with the percentage symbol and said as "number percent".

3) Guidance is given for writing out large numbers in English, such as one thousand, one hundred thousand, one million, etc.
